scripts.release:check: npm run test && npm run check-db-config && npx expo config --type public --json > /dev/null
scripts.release:check:ios: npm run release:check && npm run health:ios-sim
scripts.test: tsc -p tsconfig.test.json && node tmp-test/tests/timeUtils.test.js && node tmp-test/tests/shiftPhase.test.js && node tmp-test/tests/notificationUtils.test.js && node tmp-test/tests/notificationStateUtils.test.js && node tmp-test/tests/notificationViewUtils.test.js && node tmp-test/tests/shiftNotificationUtils.test.js && node tmp-test/tests/maps.test.js && node tmp-test/tests/shiftConfirmationStatus.test.js && node tmp-test/tests/runtimeHealthUtils.test.js && node tmp-test/tests/shiftMapping.test.js && node tmp-test/tests/calendarSelectionUtils.test.js && node tmp-test/tests/languageUtils.test.js && node tmp-test/tests/i18nTranslations.test.js && node tmp-test/tests/i18nInterpolation.test.js && node tmp-test/tests/notificationLocalization.test.js && node tmp-test/tests/i18nSafeguard.test.js && node tmp-test/tests/languagePersistence.test.js && node tmp-test/tests/shiftNotificationI18n.test.js && node tmp-test/tests/shiftNotificationPayload.test.js && node tmp-test/tests/notificationPersistence.test.js && node tmp-test/tests/responsiveLayout.test.js && node tmp-test/tests/screenLocalizationContracts.test.js && node tmp-test/tests/i18nMonitoringIntegration.test.js && node tmp-test/tests/uiNotificationsIntegration.test.js && node tmp-test/tests/uiAccountIntegration.test.js && node tmp-test/tests/e2eLanguageRestartFlow.test.js && node tmp-test/tests/e2eNotificationRealtimeFlow.test.js && node tmp-test/tests/visualResponsiveSnapshot.test.js && node tmp-test/tests/visualLocalizationSnapshot.test.js
